original_title: UFC Fight Night 71: Mir vs. Duffee
overview: UFC Fight Night 71: Mir vs. Duffee was a mixed martial arts event held on July 15, 2015 at the Valley View Casino Center in San Diego, California. The event was headlined by a heavyweight bout between former UFC Heavyweight champion Frank Mir and touted prospect Todd Duffee.
title: UFC Fight Night 71: Mir vs. Duffee
